text: Maria José a Santo Tomas (15 January 1747 - 18 July 1801) was a Portuguese clergyman, who was Prelate of Mozambico, Mozambique from 18 July 1783 and Titular Bishop of Pentacomia from 28 October 1785. ==References== Category:Portuguese Roman Catholic bishops in Africa Category:Mozambican Roman Catholic bishops Category:1747 births Category:1801 deaths
title: Maria José a Santo Tomas
